Function Detail

aws_signed_request()

void aws_signed_request(string $region, array $params, string $public_key, string $private_key, string $associate_tag)

Access the Amazon API and obtain data

Parameters:
region - Locale for the Amazon site to query (e.g. 'de' or 'com')
params - Search parameters
public_key - AWS public key
private_key - AWS private key
associate_tag - Amazon PartnerNet ID
